title: "Merge_otu&taxa_Micca"
author: "Chiara Gini"
date: "2023-06-08"
output: html_document
---

```{r closedref, include=FALSE}
library(stringr)

otu <- read.csv("~/Results/PIPELINE_COMPARISON/RESULTS/Milk-dataset/otutable_closedref.Micca_x_greengenes2-milk.txt", sep = "\t", header = T)
taxa <- read.csv("~/Results/PIPELINE_COMPARISON/RESULTS/Milk-dataset/taxa_closedref.Micca_x_greengenes2-milk.txt", sep = "\t", header = F)
colnames(taxa)[1] ="OTU"
colnames(taxa)[2] = "taxonomy"
taxonomy <- merge(otu, taxa, by=c("OTU"),all.x=TRUE)
taxonomy[c('kingdom', 'phylum', 'class', 'order', 'family', 'genus', 'species')] <- str_split_fixed(taxonomy$taxonomy, ';', 7)
taxonomy$taxonomy <- NULL

write.csv(taxonomy, file="~/Results/PIPELINE_COMPARISON/RESULTS/Milk-dataset/taxonomy_Micca.closedref_x_greengenes2.csv")
```
